_ai_instructions.usage_note: Use @** blocks for AI prompts, parameter descriptions, and usage patterns
_ai_instructions.file_purpose: RR.Blazor R* Components comprehensive documentation with AI metadata

ai_metadata.description: Component summary and capabilities from @** blocks
ai_metadata.avoidUsage: When NOT to use this component
ai_metadata.patterns: Named patterns for specific use cases

parameter_metadata.aiHint: AI-friendly usage hint from AIParameter attribute

structure.utilityPatterns: Common utility class patterns and AI hints
structure.cssVariables: CSS custom properties with usage guidance
structure.components: All R* components with full AI metadata, parameters, and usage patterns
structure.aiPatterns: Pre-built patterns for common use cases

RTabItem.description: Individual tab item component for RTabs container with icon, badge, and content support. Supports closable tabs, disabled states, and badge notifications for professional tab experiences.
RTabItem.avoidUsage: Don't use outside RTabs container. Use RButton for standalone buttons.
RTabItem.aiPrompt: Create individual tab item for RTabs container

patterns.basic-tab: Text and ChildContent for simple tab item

RTabItem.commonUse: tab content organization, document tabs, settings sections
RTabItem.name: RTabItem

RForm.description: Professional form component with validation, state management, and accessibility
RForm.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple single-field inputs or display-only content
RForm.aiPrompt: Create a professional form container with validation and submission handling
RForm.commonUse: user registration, data entry, settings forms, contact forms

OnInvalidSubmit.aiHint: Called when form is submitted with invalid data
OnInvalidSubmit.name: OnInvalidSubmit

OnStateChanged.aiHint: Called when form state changes (submitting, success, error)
OnStateChanged.name: OnStateChanged

Model.aiHint: Data model bound to the form
Model.name: Model

Icon.aiHint: Icon displayed next to form title
Icon.name: Icon

Layout.aiHint: Form layout style (Default, Executive, Modal, Compact)
Layout.name: Layout

ShowFormHeader.aiHint: Whether to show the form header section
ShowFormHeader.name: ShowFormHeader

OnValidSubmit.aiHint: Called when form is submitted with valid data
OnValidSubmit.name: OnValidSubmit

RForm.name: RForm

RTabs.description: Professional tab container for organizing content with smooth animations and enterprise styling. Supports multiple variants, badges, closable tabs, keyboard navigation, and accessibility.
RTabs.avoidUsage: Don't use for navigation breadcrumbs - use RBreadcrumbs instead. Avoid for simple toggles.
RTabs.aiPrompt: Create professional tabs for content organization

patterns.closable-tabs: IsClosable="true" on RTabItem for document-style tabs
patterns.basic-tabs: RTabs with RTabItem children for content organization
patterns.badge-tabs: BadgeCount on RTabItem for notification indicators

RTabs.commonUse: dashboards, forms, data views, settings panels, multi-step workflows

OnTabClosed.description: Called when tab close button is clicked
OnTabClosed.name: OnTabClosed

OnAddTab.description: Called when add tab button is clicked
OnAddTab.name: OnAddTab

NoPadding.description: Whether tab content has no padding
NoPadding.name: NoPadding

ShowAddButton.description: Whether to show add tab button
ShowAddButton.name: ShowAddButton

RTabs.name: RTabs

ChildContent.description: Custom content for the value area
ChildContent.name: ChildContent

Value.description: Value text for the summary item
Value.name: Value

Label.description: Label text for the summary item
Label.name: Label

Expanded.description: Whether the item is expanded initially
Expanded.name: Expanded

RFormSection.description: Professional form section container with collapsible header and grid layout
RFormSection.avoidUsage: Don't use for single fields or when no grouping is needed
RFormSection.aiPrompt: Create a form section with header and organized field layout
RFormSection.commonUse: form organization, grouped fields, collapsible sections, multi-step forms

ShowHeader.aiHint: Whether to show the section header
ShowHeader.name: ShowHeader

Elevation.aiHint: Visual elevation level (None, Subtle, Medium, High)
Elevation.name: Elevation

Icon.aiHint: Icon displayed next to section title
Icon.name: Icon

FieldColumns.aiHint: Number of columns for field layout (1-4)
FieldColumns.name: FieldColumns

RFormSection.name: RFormSection

RActionGroup.description: Professional action group component for organizing multiple buttons with consistent spacing and alignment. Supports horizontal/vertical layouts, responsive behavior, and flexible alignment options.
RActionGroup.avoidUsage: Don't use for single buttons - use RButton directly. Avoid for non-action content.
RActionGroup.aiPrompt: Create a professional action group for organizing buttons
RActionGroup.commonUse: form actions, toolbar buttons, navigation controls, modal actions

FullWidth.aiHint: Use for vertical menus and mobile layouts for full-width buttons
FullWidth.description: Whether buttons should be full width in vertical layout
FullWidth.name: FullWidth

Direction.aiHint: Horizontal for forms/toolbars, Vertical for dropdowns/mobile layouts
Direction.description: Layout direction for the action group - horizontal or vertical arrangement
Direction.name: Direction

Responsive.aiHint: True for responsive mobile layouts, false for fixed layouts
Responsive.description: Whether to wrap on small screens for responsive behavior
Responsive.name: Responsive

Alignment.aiHint: End for form actions, SpaceBetween for opposing actions, Center for balanced
Alignment.description: Alignment for the action group - determines button positioning
Alignment.name: Alignment

Spacing.aiHint: Medium for most cases, Small for compact toolbars, Large for prominence
Spacing.description: Spacing between actions - controls gap between buttons
Spacing.name: Spacing

RActionGroup.name: RActionGroup

RDatePicker.description: Professional date and time picker with calendar popup and time selection
RDatePicker.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple date input - use RDatePickerBasic instead
RDatePicker.aiPrompt: Create a date/time picker with calendar popup and validation
RDatePicker.commonUse: date selection, appointment scheduling, event planning, form dates

Label.aiHint: Label text displayed above the picker
Label.name: Label

Placeholder.aiHint: Placeholder text when no date selected
Placeholder.name: Placeholder

Size.aiHint: Size of the picker input (Small, Medium, Large)
Size.name: Size

Use24HourFormat.aiHint: Use 24-hour time format instead of AM/PM
Use24HourFormat.name: Use24HourFormat

DisabledDaysOfWeek.aiHint: Array of disabled days of week
DisabledDaysOfWeek.name: DisabledDaysOfWeek

RDatePicker.name: RDatePicker

RBreadcrumbs.description: Professional breadcrumb navigation component for showing page hierarchy and navigation paths. Supports icons, custom separators, responsive collapsing, and accessibility features.
RBreadcrumbs.avoidUsage: Don't use for primary navigation - use RNavMenu instead. Avoid for single-level pages.
RBreadcrumbs.aiPrompt: Create breadcrumb navigation for page hierarchy

patterns.custom-separator: Separator or SeparatorIcon for custom dividers
patterns.icon-breadcrumbs: BreadcrumbItem with Icon property for visual hierarchy

RBreadcrumbs.commonUse: page navigation, hierarchy display, user location indication

MaxVisibleItems.description: Max items to show before collapsing
MaxVisibleItems.name: MaxVisibleItems

CollapsibleOnMobile.description: Whether to collapse items on mobile
CollapsibleOnMobile.name: CollapsibleOnMobile

RBreadcrumbs.name: RBreadcrumbs

RNavMenu.description: Professional navigation menu component for sidebar and main navigation with hierarchical support. Supports collapsible groups, badges, icons, and responsive behavior for enterprise applications.
RNavMenu.avoidUsage: Don't use for breadcrumbs - use RBreadcrumbs instead. Avoid for action menus - use RDropdown.
RNavMenu.aiPrompt: Create navigation menu for app sidebar

patterns.hierarchical-nav: NavMenuItem with Children for nested menu structure
patterns.basic-nav: Items list with NavMenuItem objects for simple navigation
patterns.badge-nav: NavMenuItem with Badge for notifications and counts

RNavMenu.commonUse: sidebar navigation, main menu, hierarchical navigation, app structure
RNavMenu.name: RNavMenu

RFormModal.description: Generic form modal component for dynamic form generation and validation
RFormModal.avoidUsage: Don't use for complex custom forms - create dedicated form components instead
RFormModal.aiPrompt: Create a modal with auto-generated form fields from a model
RFormModal.commonUse: quick edit modals, auto-generated forms, dynamic data entry

FormComponent.aiHint: Custom form component type to use instead of auto-generation
FormComponent.name: FormComponent

ChildContent.aiHint: Custom form content instead of auto-generation
ChildContent.name: ChildContent

FormParameters.aiHint: Additional parameters passed to custom form component
FormParameters.name: FormParameters

InitialData.aiHint: Initial data model for the form
InitialData.name: InitialData

RFormModal.name: RFormModal

RFormField.description: Universal form field component with professional validation and utility-first CSS
RFormField.avoidUsage: Don't use for display-only data or readonly content
RFormField.aiPrompt: Create a professional form field for user input with validation
RFormField.commonUse: text input, email validation, password fields, dropdowns, checkboxes, file uploads

OnStartIconClick.description: Called when start icon is clicked
OnStartIconClick.name: OnStartIconClick

Label.aiHint: Label text displayed above the field
Label.name: Label

InputId.aiHint: Unique identifier for the input field
InputId.name: InputId

Type.aiHint: Type of input field (Text, Email, Password, Select, etc.)
Type.name: Type

Loading.description: Whether field is in loading state
Loading.name: Loading

FieldName.description: Field name for binding to validation context (auto-derived from Label if not set)
FieldName.name: FieldName

Class.description: Additional CSS classes for the field group
Class.name: Class

InputClass.description: Additional CSS classes for the input element
InputClass.name: InputClass

Value.aiHint: Current value of the input field
Value.name: Value

Placeholder.aiHint: Placeholder text shown when field is empty
Placeholder.name: Placeholder

OnEndIconClick.description: Called when end icon is clicked
OnEndIconClick.name: OnEndIconClick

HasError.description: Whether field has validation error (auto-calculated from ErrorMessage)
HasError.name: HasError

ShowRangeValue.description: Show current value for range input
ShowRangeValue.name: ShowRangeValue

EndIcon.description: Icon on the right side of the input
EndIcon.name: EndIcon

StartIcon.description: Icon on the left side of the input
StartIcon.name: StartIcon

Required.aiHint: Mark field as required for form validation
Required.name: Required

Variant.aiHint: Visual style variant of the field
Variant.description: Field style variant (Default, Clean, Outlined, Filled)
Variant.name: Variant

RFormField.name: RFormField

RSwitcher.description: Professional switcher component for toggling between multiple options
RSwitcher.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple on/off toggles - use checkbox instead
RSwitcher.aiPrompt: Create a switcher for selecting between multiple options or states
RSwitcher.commonUse: tab switching, view toggles, option selection, filters

Variant.aiHint: Visual style variant (Standard, Pills, Tabs, Buttons)
Variant.name: Variant

Items.aiHint: Collection of items to switch between
Items.name: Items

Size.aiHint: Size of switcher items (Small, Medium, Large)
Size.name: Size

RSwitcher.name: RSwitcher

OnExpanded.description: Callback when an item is expanded
OnExpanded.name: OnExpanded

Bordered.description: Whether to show borders between items
Bordered.name: Bordered

Separated.description: Whether to show separators between items
Separated.name: Separated

Multiple.description: Whether multiple items can be expanded at once
Multiple.name: Multiple

OnCollapsed.description: Callback when an item is collapsed
OnCollapsed.name: OnCollapsed

RDatePickerBasic.description: Simplified HTML5 date picker for basic date input scenarios
RDatePickerBasic.avoidUsage: Don't use for complex date ranges or when calendar popup is needed
RDatePickerBasic.aiPrompt: Create a simple HTML5 date picker input
RDatePickerBasic.commonUse: simple date input, forms, basic date selection

Placeholder.aiHint: Placeholder text when no date selected
Placeholder.name: Placeholder

Label.aiHint: Label text displayed above the input
Label.name: Label

HelpText.aiHint: Help text displayed below the input
HelpText.name: HelpText

RDatePickerBasic.name: RDatePickerBasic

ShowRelativeTime.description: Whether to show relative times (e.g., "2 hours ago")
ShowRelativeTime.name: ShowRelativeTime

LoadingItemCount.description: Number of skeleton items to show when loading
LoadingItemCount.name: LoadingItemCount

RBadge.description: Professional badge component for status indicators, counts, and labels. Supports multiple variants, sizes, and interactive states with enterprise-grade styling.
RBadge.avoidUsage: Don't use for navigation buttons - use RButton instead. Avoid for large text content.
RBadge.aiPrompt: Create a professional badge for status or count display
RBadge.commonUse: status indicators, counts, labels, notifications, tags

OnClick.description: Click event handler for interactive badges
OnClick.name: OnClick

Icon.aiHint: Common icons: check_circle, warning, error, info, star, notifications
Icon.description: Material icon name to display alongside text
Icon.name: Icon

ChildContent.description: Child content for custom badge content
ChildContent.name: ChildContent

Variant.aiHint: Primary for emphasis, Success for positive, Warning for attention, Danger for errors
Variant.description: Badge variant - determines color scheme and semantic meaning
Variant.name: Variant

Text.aiHint: Keep text short: Active, 5, New, Pending. Use 1-10 characters max
Text.description: Badge text content - typically short labels, counts, or status indicators
Text.name: Text

Size.aiHint: Medium is default, Small for compact layouts, Large for prominence
Size.description: Badge size - affects padding, text size, and overall dimensions
Size.name: Size

Clickable.aiHint: Set to true for interactive badges that perform actions
Clickable.description: Whether badge is clickable - adds hover effects and cursor pointer
Clickable.name: Clickable

RBadge.name: RBadge

Divided.description: Whether to show dividers between items
Divided.name: Divided

RDivider.description: Professional divider component for visual separation with text support and multiple styles. Supports horizontal/vertical orientation, customizable styling, and automatic menu integration.
RDivider.avoidUsage: Don't overuse - only for logical content separation. Avoid decorative usage.
RDivider.aiPrompt: Create a professional divider for visual separation

patterns.simple-divider: No parameters for basic horizontal line

RDivider.commonUse: section separation, menu dividers, form sections, content organization

TextAlign.aiHint: Center for balanced labels, Left for section headers, Right for special cases
TextAlign.description: Text alignment for dividers with text content
TextAlign.name: TextAlign

Variant.aiHint: Horizontal for section breaks, Vertical for inline separation
Variant.description: Divider variant - orientation of the divider line
Variant.name: Variant

Style.aiHint: Solid for standard, Dashed for softer, Dotted for subtle separation
Style.description: Divider style - visual appearance of the divider line
Style.name: Style

Text.aiHint: Use for section labels like Settings, Advanced Options, OR. Keep short
Text.description: Divider text (optional) - displays label within the divider line
Text.name: Text

RDivider.name: RDivider

RCard.description: Professional card component for content containers with business-grade variants. Supports header, media, content areas, loading states, elevation effects, and comprehensive interaction patterns.
RCard.avoidUsage: Don't use for navigation - use RLink instead. Avoid for simple text without structure.
RCard.aiPrompt: Create a professional card for content display

patterns.basic-card: Title="Card Title" Content="Card content" for simple content cards
patterns.elevated-card: Elevation="4" for cards that need prominence
patterns.media-card: ImageSrc="/image.jpg" ImageAlt="Description" for cards with images

RCard.commonUse: dashboards, data display, content organization, information panels

Title.aiHint: Use descriptive titles like Employee Details, Payment Summary
Title.description: Card title - main heading displayed in header area
Title.name: Title

FullBleedImage.description: Whether image should be full bleed
FullBleedImage.name: FullBleedImage

Content.aiHint: Use for simple text, or ChildContent for complex layouts
Content.description: Card content text - simple text content for the card body
Content.name: Content

Loading.aiHint: Use during async operations to show processing state
Loading.description: Whether card is in loading state - shows overlay with spinner
Loading.name: Loading

Icon.aiHint: Common icons: dashboard, person, settings, analytics, payment
Icon.description: Material icon name displayed in header area
Icon.name: Icon

Clickable.aiHint: Set to true for interactive cards that perform actions
Clickable.description: Whether card is clickable - adds hover effects and cursor pointer
Clickable.name: Clickable

Subtitle.aiHint: Use for additional context like dates, categories, descriptions
Subtitle.description: Card subtitle - secondary text displayed below title
Subtitle.name: Subtitle

ImageSrc.aiHint: Use for hero images, thumbnails, or visual content
ImageSrc.description: Image source URL for media content
ImageSrc.name: ImageSrc

NoPadding.description: Whether to remove padding from content
NoPadding.name: NoPadding

Elevation.aiHint: Use 0 for flat, 2-4 for standard, 8+ for prominent. -1 uses variant default
Elevation.description: Elevation level (0-24) - controls shadow depth and prominence
Elevation.name: Elevation

Variant.aiHint: Default for standard cards, Elevated for prominence, Glass for modern overlays
Variant.description: Card variant style - determines visual appearance and behavior
Variant.name: Variant

RCard.name: RCard

RButton.description: Professional button component with enterprise variants, AI-optimized for rapid development. Supports 9 variants, 5 sizes, loading states, elevation effects, and comprehensive accessibility.
RButton.avoidUsage: Don't use for navigation links - use RLink instead. Avoid for simple text without actions.
RButton.aiPrompt: Create a professional button for user actions

patterns.primary-action: Variant="ButtonVariant.Primary" for main actions like Save, Submit, Create
patterns.destructive-action: Variant="ButtonVariant.Danger" for destructive actions like Delete, Remove
patterns.secondary-action: Variant="ButtonVariant.Secondary" for supporting actions like Cancel, Back
patterns.icon-button: Icon="icon_name" IconPosition="IconPosition.Start" for buttons with icons

Text.aiHint: Use action verbs like Save, Delete, Create. Keep concise.
Text.description: Button text content - the main label displayed on the button
Text.name: Text

Loading.description: Whether button is in loading state
Loading.name: Loading

Icon.aiHint: Common icons: save, delete, edit, add, search, settings
Icon.description: Material icon name to display alongside text
Icon.name: Icon

Type.aiHint: Submit for forms, Button for regular actions
Type.description: Button type attribute for form interaction
Type.name: Type

Target.aiHint: _blank for new window, _self for same window
Target.description: Target for navigation (_blank for new window)
Target.name: Target

Href.aiHint: Button navigates to this URL when clicked
Href.description: URL for navigation when button is clicked
Href.name: Href

IconPosition.aiHint: Start is most common, End for arrows, Top for stacked layouts
IconPosition.description: Position of icon relative to text content
IconPosition.name: IconPosition

Rounded.description: Whether button should have rounded corners
Rounded.name: Rounded

ChildContent.description: Child content for custom button content
ChildContent.name: ChildContent

Size.aiHint: Medium is default, Large for prominent actions, Small for compact
Size.description: Button size - affects padding, text size, and overall dimensions
Size.name: Size

Tooltip.description: Whether to show tooltip on hover
Tooltip.name: Tooltip

Variant.aiHint: Primary for main actions, Secondary for supporting, Danger for destructive
Variant.description: Button variant style - determines visual appearance and behavior
Variant.name: Variant

RButton.name: RButton

RDropdown.description: Professional dropdown component for item selection with keyboard navigation and accessibility. Supports custom triggers, loading states, search filtering, and flexible item rendering.
RDropdown.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple text inputs - use RFormField instead. Avoid for navigation - use RNavMenu.
RDropdown.aiPrompt: Create dropdown menu for item selection

patterns.basic-dropdown: Items list with TriggerContent for basic selection
patterns.action-dropdown: Button trigger with action items for context menus

RDropdown.commonUse: select menus, action menus, option lists, context menus
RDropdown.name: RDropdown

RSection.description: Professional content section component with header, collapsible content, and footer areas. Ideal for organizing page content with consistent styling and optional interactive features.
RSection.avoidUsage: Don't use for main app layout - use RAppShell instead. Avoid for simple content without headers.
RSection.aiPrompt: Create content section with header and body

patterns.action-section: TitleContent for sections with header actions
patterns.basic-section: Title and ChildContent for simple content sections
patterns.icon-section: Icon and Title for branded section headers

RSection.commonUse: page sections, content organization, collapsible panels, form groups
RSection.name: RSection

RGrid.description: Professional responsive grid component with RR.Blazor patterns
RGrid.commonUse: Dashboard grids, stats cards, responsive layouts, card containers
RGrid.name: RGrid

Label.description: Label text for the info item
Label.name: Label

ChildContent.description: Custom content for the value area
ChildContent.name: ChildContent

Value.description: Value text for the info item
Value.name: Value

RAppShell.description: Complete application shell with header, sidebar, navigation, search, and theme support. Zero-config setup for enterprise Blazor applications with professional styling and full responsiveness.
RAppShell.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple pages without navigation. Use RSection for content organization instead.
RAppShell.aiPrompt: Create complete app layout with header and sidebar

patterns.zero-config: Title only for minimal app setup
patterns.full-enterprise: All parameters for complete enterprise application

RAppShell.commonUse: main app layout, admin dashboards, enterprise applications, SaaS platforms

SearchCollapsible.description: Make search collapsible on the right side
SearchCollapsible.name: SearchCollapsible

ContentCentered.description: Whether content should be centered when max width is applied
ContentCentered.name: ContentCentered

CurrentUser.description: Current user for user menu and permissions
CurrentUser.name: CurrentUser

ContentMaxWidth.description: Content maximum width (e.g., "1200px", "90%"). Default is no constraint.
ContentMaxWidth.name: ContentMaxWidth

RAppShell.name: RAppShell

RChip.description: Professional chip component for tags, filters, and selections with interactive states. Supports removable chips, selection indicators, icons, and multiple variants.
RChip.avoidUsage: Don't use for buttons - use RButton. Avoid for large content blocks.
RChip.aiPrompt: Create a chip/tag for filters, selections, or labels
RChip.commonUse: filter chips, tag lists, multi-select indicators, status tags
RChip.name: RChip

RFileUpload.description: Professional file upload component with drag-drop, validation, and preview
RFileUpload.avoidUsage: Don't use for simple text input or when files are not needed
RFileUpload.aiPrompt: Create a file upload component with drag-drop and file validation
RFileUpload.commonUse: document upload, image upload, file attachments, media upload

Multiple.aiHint: Allow selecting multiple files at once
Multiple.name: Multiple

DisplayMode.aiHint: Visual style mode (DropZone, Button, Inline, Minimal)

AllowedTypes.aiHint: Array of allowed file extensions or MIME types

ComponentId.aiHint: Unique identifier for the file upload component

BrowseButtonText.name: BrowseButtonText

ShowBrowseButton.description: Show browse button in drop zone
ShowBrowseButton.name: ShowBrowseButton

ItemHeight.description: Height of each item in pixels

SkeletonCount.description: Number of skeleton items to show when loading

Items.description: Items to display in the virtual list

OnLoadMore.description: Callback when more items need to be loaded

AutoLoadMore.description: Auto-load more when scrolling near bottom

HasMoreItems.name: HasMoreItems

RSectionDivider.description: Professional section divider component for organizing content areas with titles, icons, and visual separation. Supports multiple sizes, alignments, and semantic variants with enterprise-grade styling.
RSectionDivider.avoidUsage: Don't overuse - only for logical section breaks. Avoid for simple line separation.

patterns.titled-section: Title="User Settings" Icon="settings" for labeled content sections

RSectionDivider.commonUse: page sections, form organization, content separation, feature grouping

ShowLine.aiHint: True for visual separation, false for text-only headers
ShowLine.description: Whether to show the dividing line extending from the content
ShowLine.name: ShowLine

Icon.aiHint: Common icons: settings, person, security, payment, work, home
Icon.description: Material icon name displayed alongside the section title

ChildContent.description: Child content for custom section content
ChildContent.name: ChildContent

Variant.aiHint: Primary for important sections, Success for completed, Warning for attention

Alignment.aiHint: Left for standard sections, Center for balanced layouts, Right for special cases
Alignment.description: Section divider alignment - controls content positioning and line placement

Title.aiHint: Use descriptive section names like Personal Information, Security Settings

Subtitle.aiHint: Use for helpful descriptions like Update your profile information
Subtitle.description: Section subtitle - additional context or description for the section

ShowDateRange.description: Whether to show date range filter
ShowDateRange.name: ShowDateRange

ShowFilterCount.description: Whether to show active filter count

ShowClearButton.name: ShowClearButton

RAvatar.description: Professional avatar component for user representation with status indicators and interactive features. Supports images, initials, icons, status badges, and notification counts with responsive sizing.
RAvatar.avoidUsage: Don't use for decorative icons - use Icon component instead. Avoid for non-user content.
RAvatar.aiPrompt: Create a professional avatar for user representation

patterns.user-avatar: ImageSrc="/avatar.jpg" Alt="User Name" for profile pictures

RAvatar.commonUse: user profiles, team members, contact lists, navigation headers

BadgeCount.aiHint: Shows actual count, displays 99+ for values over 99
BadgeCount.description: Badge count number displayed in notification badge
BadgeCount.name: BadgeCount

ShowBadge.aiHint: Use for unread message counts, notification indicators, pending items
ShowBadge.description: Whether to show notification badge with count
ShowBadge.name: ShowBadge

Variant.aiHint: Default for neutral, Primary for branded, Success/Warning/Error for status
Variant.description: Avatar variant style - determines color scheme and background
Variant.name: Variant

ShowStatus.aiHint: Use for presence indicators in chat, team lists, user directories
ShowStatus.description: Whether to show status indicator dot
ShowStatus.name: ShowStatus

Status.aiHint: Online for active, Away for inactive, Busy for do-not-disturb, Offline for unavailable
Status.name: Status

IsClickable.aiHint: Set to true for interactive avatars that open profiles or menus
IsClickable.description: Whether avatar is clickable - adds hover effects and cursor pointer
IsClickable.name: IsClickable

Text.aiHint: Use 1-2 character initials like JD, AB. Automatically uppercase
Text.description: Text content (typically initials) when no image is available
Text.name: Text

Icon.aiHint: Common icons: person, account_circle, face, group. Defaults to person
Icon.description: Material icon name as fallback when no image or text provided
Icon.name: Icon

Size.aiHint: Medium is default, Large for prominent display, Small for compact layouts
Size.description: Avatar size variant - determines dimensions and icon/text sizing
Size.name: Size

ImageSrc.aiHint: Use high-quality square images. Falls back to text/icon if not provided
ImageSrc.description: Image source URL for profile picture
ImageSrc.name: ImageSrc

Alt.aiHint: Use descriptive text like 'John Doe profile picture' for screen readers
Alt.name: Alt

RAvatar.name: RAvatar

borders.extrapolation: border-t-[...], border-b-[...], border-l-[...], border-r-[...], border-x-[...], border-y-[...], rounded-t-[...], rounded-b-[...], rounded-l-[...], rounded-r-[...]
borders.aiHint: Use rounded-md for standard rounding, border-2 for medium borders, combine with border--primary for colored borders

display.extrapolation: d-sm-[...], d-md-[...], d-lg-[...], d-xl-[...] for responsive display variants
display.aiHint: Use d-flex for flexbox, d-grid for grid, d-none for hiding, d-block for block display

visibility.aiHint: Use opacity-50 for semi-transparent elements, overflow-hidden to hide content, visible/invisible for visibility control

elevation.description: Elevation and shadow utility classes for depth
elevation.aiHint: Use elevation-4 for cards, elevation-8 for modals, elevation-12 for floating elements. Add hover: hover:elevation-6

grid.description: CSS Grid utility classes for complex layouts
grid.aiHint: Use d-grid grid-cols-3 for 3-column layouts, grid-cols-auto-fit-250 for responsive auto-fit columns

sizing.aiHint: Use w-full for 100% width, h-auto for automatic height, w-64 for fixed widths

transforms.aiHint: Use scale-105 for hover effects, rotate-45 for angled elements, translate-x-4 for positioning

positioning.aiHint: Use position-relative for relative positioning, position-absolute for absolute, z-50 for high z-index

colors.description: Semantic color utilities with theme awareness
colors.aiHint: Use text--primary for main text, bg--elevated for raised surfaces, text--secondary for supporting text

glass.description: Glassmorphism effect utilities with backdrop blur
glass.aiHint: Use glass-light for subtle effects, glass-heavy for prominent overlays, combine with backdrop-blur-md for modern glass effect

typography.description: Typography utility classes for text styling
typography.aiHint: Use text--base for normal text, font-medium for emphasis, leading-relaxed for better readability

spacing.description: Padding, margin, and gap utility classes with directional variants
spacing.aiHint: Use pa-4 for standard padding, ma-2 for small margins, gap-3 for flex/grid gaps. Add directional: pt-4, pb-2, ml-3, mr-auto

interactive.description: Interactive utility classes for user interaction
interactive.aiHint: Use cursor-pointer for clickable elements, user-select-none to prevent selection, pointer-events-none to disable interaction

animations.aiHint: Use animate-pulse for loading states, transition-all for smooth transitions, animate-fade-in for entrance effects

flexbox.aiHint: Use d-flex justify-between for space-between layouts, align-center for vertical centering, flex-column for vertical stacking

colors.aiHint: Use --color-primary for brand colors, --color-text-primary for main text

spacing.aiHint: Use --space-4 for standard spacing, --space-8 for larger gaps

aiPatterns.aiHint: Use Primary variant for the main action user should take
aiPatterns.prompt: Create a primary action button for form submission
aiPatterns.name: Primary Action Button

aiPatterns.aiHint: Always use Danger variant and RequiresConfirmation for destructive actions
aiPatterns.prompt: Create a destructive action button for delete operations
aiPatterns.name: Destructive Action Button

aiPatterns.aiHint: Use Loading parameter to prevent double-clicks during async operations
aiPatterns.useCase: Async operations, API calls, long-running processes
aiPatterns.prompt: Create a button that shows loading state during async operations
aiPatterns.name: Loading Button
